channel.title: [PI] Action button
channel.description: How do I make it when I click a action button, it teleports me to some where if I'm a mod and if I'm a player it tells me that this isn't a available option?

item.title: [PI] Action button
item.dc:creator: @vovik vovik
item.description:
@vovik wrote:

go to clickingbuttons.java
and look for something like this c.forcedText = "My Ranged level is " + c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + ".";
than add something like this

case 113244: if (c.playerRights >= 1) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2122, 4914, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the StaffZone " + c.playerName +"."); }
case 113244 is the click id # just replace it with watever u want it to be and the rest u should know
also if u dont want players to see it say staff zone just go to playerassistant.java
if its in the quest tab look for public void writeQuestTab() {
add something like this if (c.playerRights >= 1) { sendFrame126("@gre@Teleport to Staff Zone", 29172); }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Action button

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

90% the things you click are an action button. Be more specific plox.
